price_text: Motivated Vendor now open to offers
description:
Occupying a prominent location in this popular and most sought-after location being only a short distance from the waterfront overlooking Pumicestone Passage and easily accessible to the Bruce Highway giving access to both the Brisbane Airport and CBD.
Only a short drive from Bribie Island and the popular Sandstone Point Hotel Complex.
This magnificent architecturally designed family home is located on a substantial 1,110 square meter block which briefly affords:- a spacious living area, a fully fitted kitchen overlooking the dining area, a master bedroom with a walk-in robe and bathroom en suite, three further bedrooms, and a second bathroom. OUTSIDE:- Double garage with recessed laundry, large undercover patio. Ample room for an in-ground swimming pool if required by the discerning purchaser.
Strongly recommended for immediate inspection to fully appreciate the main features available. Contact the listing agent Martin Howard-Smith on 0415 928 412 to arrange your personnel inspection today

INTERNAL FEATURES INCLUDE:-
. Formal lounge & dining area has tiled flooring
. Immaculate fitted kitchen overlooking the dining area
. Master bedroom with bathroom en suite
. 3 further bedrooms & second bathroom
. One bedroom could easily be used as a study if required

EXTERNAL FEATURES INCLUDE:-
. Double garage with recessed laundry
. Large outdoor undercover entertainment area
. Useful 3x3 garden shed & 6x3 workshop

ADDITIONAL FEATURES INCLUDE:-
. Air conditioning & fitted air conditioning throughout
. 6 KW Solar system is installed
. 20,000 litre water tank having a UV filter plumbed to the interior water system
. Ample room for a swimming pool
. 238 square metres of internal living space
Motivated Vendor Offers Now Invited On $799,000.





Tucked away in a peaceful location only minutes from the waters edge, this 4 bedroom, (main with ensuite and walk-in robe), 2 bathroom, (spa bath in the main bathroom), 2 living areas, double garaged home that has everything a family could ask for. Apart from being 5 mins from the iconic Bribie Island with its beachy lifestyle and 15 mins from major shopping centres including, Asian and European food markets, cinemas, restaurants, clubs, both sporting and social, Industrial parks and major apartment stores, like Harvey Norman, Amart furnisher and Kmart, the property sits on a huge 1110m2 block.

Across the road from a leafy bushland setting leading down to the waters edge and, for the outdoorsy type opening up to the Pumicestone passage and all the area has to offer, including fishing, water sports, cafes, restaurants, clubs and the ever so popular Sandstone Point hotel. The house is energy efficient with a 6.6kw solar system, 20,000 litres of tank water that is plumbed into the house, after being UV filtered and even the windows are tinted, to give you maximise advantage of the insulated and newly painted roof. The home has air conditioning and ceiling fans throughout. The hot water system is electric and energy efficient

due to the solar system but is also connected to gas if you prefer. The back yard already has a 3x6m powered workshop and 3x3m garden shed for the handy man or tradie. A huge, netted veggie patch completes the green package, and having side access to the back yard would make it perfect for the tradesperson and or, add a pool or granny flat. The House including the undercover, all-weather patio is 238m2 in total. Great value for money at this price, as it is well under replacement cost. A must to inspect, call for a private inspection.
